title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Godfather: Part II
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s NYC is portrayed while his son expands the family crime syndicate.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers a simulated reality and joins a rebellion.

title: Inception
description: A thief enters dreams to steal secrets.

title: Spirited Away
description: A girl navigates a magical world to save her parents.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to prove a point.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies, wars, and more through the eyes of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland, Oskar Schindler saves Jewish refugees.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor, the divided fellowship makes a stand.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist.

title: Jurassic Park
description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of Dr. Hannibal Lecter to catch another serial killer.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines.

title: Interstellar
description: A team travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son.

title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly, a teenager, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened when a new spaceman figure replaces him as top toy.

title: Finding Nemo
description: After his son is captured, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle.

title: Casablanca
description: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide between love and virtue.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution.

title: Goodfellas
description: The rise and fall of mob associate Henry Hill and his friends.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other.

title: Whiplash
description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory.

title: The Prestige
description: Two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.

title: Alien
description: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants.

title: Apocalypse Now
description: An American officer travels upriver into Cambodia seeking a renegade colonel.

title: Jaws
description: A giant man-eating great white shark attacks beachgoers.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A troubled child connects with an extraterrestrial who is stranded on Earth.

title: A Clockwork Orange
description: In a dystopian future, a gang leader is subjected to experimental behavior modification.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: A voyage to Jupiter with a sentient computer HAL after the discovery of a mysterious monolith.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel where a sinister presence influences the father.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up to flee from a cult leader.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa returns home as king of Wakanda but finds his sovereignty challenged.

title: La La Land
description: A musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents and senses something amiss.

title: Moonlight
description: A young man deals with his dysfunctional home life and sexuality while growing up in Miami.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the symbiotic relationship between two families.

title: Joker
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck embarks on a downward spiral.
Two young British soldiers during WWI are given a mission to deliver a message.

title: Dune
description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family.
